title: The Avengers
content: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

title: Avengers: Age of Ultron
content: When Tony Stark tries to jumpstart a dormant peacekeeping program, things go awry, and the Avengers must stop the villainous Ultron from enacting his terrible plans.

title: Avengers: Infinity War
content: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

title: Avengers: Endgame
content: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War, the surviving heroes must assemble once more to undo Thanos's actions and restore order to the universe.
